p.s: Barack Obama hold a speech at the 7.04.2009 at the Culture and Arts Center of Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University in Tophane, which is a part of Istanbul, Turkey.
The speech is about how important student exchanges are to tear walls between two nations down.
Obama mentions that he wants to rebuild the relationship between Turkey and America based on fairness and respect.
In the following I am going to sum up this extract from the speech.
A lot of Americans connect with other cultures/countries, a few of them travel aboard and speak to groups, other people volunteer abroad.
There are a lot of different options you can choose from.
Obama also wants to find new ways to support connecting.
He also says that exchanges are necessary to recognize common humanity, this is where progress begins.
Exchanges are a step to peace, success shared and new bridges.
Also he marks that in americaAmerica you will always find a friend in the USA.
To sum it up exchanges are really important to tear walls between two nations down and instead build bridges.
